commit message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'github/master' into OSE
Add Ukrainian lang
Create plurals.xml
Added Portuguese (Brazil) translations.
Update Serbian
Use helper from TaskContract to find the task authority.
add new defaults file and DatabaseInitializedReceiver.java, they've been forgotten to add with the previous commit

Also apply Samsung Date Picker workaround for German localization. On
some devices the German localization is affected by this bug too.
change list view item description color to grey

Allow to change the list an existing task belongs to. OpenTasks-Provider
will take care of making this a copy & delete operation.

fix #171. In case the user didn't enter a title and the description is a
single line only, we don't have a new line character to delimit the
first line. We use the entire line instead to make up a title.
fix task list mimetype reference
Merge branch 'fix-#171' into staging
Fix import of resources.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/AlexandreHertzog/opentasks into translations
Merge branch 'uk-lang' of https://github.com/burunduk/opentasks into translations
Revert app name to 'OpenTasks'.
rename directory of Portuguese (Brazil) resources

move plurals into strings.xml and remove strings comming from the
support library.
This is to ensure all strings files have the same structure.
Merge branch 'translations' into staging

Switch back to ActionBarActivity. The LG menu bug has been fixed in the
latest support library version, so the workaround is no longer needed.

rework UI - part 1
* switch to components from the support library
* replace PagerSlidingTabStrip with TabLayout
* switch to ToolBar in list view and details view
* unify details view in phone and tablet layout
* add FloatingActionButton in task list
* change scroll animation of title in details view
* move delete option in details view to overflow menu
* improve tablet layout

Still to test: Android 2.x

make sure the details view can't be scrolled if the content fits on the
page

Use own base style for dialog buttons on Android 2.x. The support
library uses non-existing color references, which causes the activtiy to
crash. Fixes github issue #152.
increase tablayout icon size from 24dp to 32dp
fix crash when trying to change the alpha value of a view on Android 2.x
Update due and start notifcation broadcast receivers to use the new extras defined in TaskContract.
fix start broadcast action
fix determination of scroll behavior

Allow to edit checklist (change, add, remove and reorder items) in
details view.

Move due date when setting a start date that is later in time. Fixes
#180

hide due date by default, so it doesn't flash up two-pane mode when a
task has no due date.
fix editor actionbar overlay sitting on top of toolbar

Some notification handling improvements. Also fixes undo notification
colors.

Replace dynamic mimttype references by static strings. The task
mimetypes are not supposed to change.

Disable disabling scoll for all Android versions <5.0. It seems to be
broken on a number of setups.
Make sure we update all notifications every midnight,

Fix widget trying to open a task by its instance _ID instead of its task
id.

Migrate from Eclipse to Android Studio/Gradle fixes #133
* use new project structure
* pull in dependencies via Gradle and Maven
* remove some

Add License of DragLinearLayout
Remove PagerSlidingTabStrip from README.md
fixed item click intent on app widget for pre Honeycomb devices

fixed homescreen widget for android 2.x, updated gitignore

Fixed the updating of the app widget on android 2.x based on ContentProviderChanged notifications.
Refactored widget code to separate post/pre Honeycomb widgets, in prepration for a redesign of the widget for newer Android versions.
Task list selection for the widget is only available on Android >=3.0
updated android 2.x app widget files
add android:windowSoftInputMode to details activity and to edit activity to fix scrolling with keyboard
Fix mdpi popup background from support v7 and add it here. The original file caused a white border on the right.
Fix large widget not being updated.
Fix deleting a URL in the editor.
add release 1.1.8
